snippet.title: Arcade Game: Wild Western (1982 Taito)
snippet.description:
A vertical shooting 'em up game where a sheriff on horseback must protect a train, located in the center of the screen, from groups of bandits. Players must avoid running into obstacles, getting shot, or allowing three bandits to board the train. A bonus game is played between rounds.

Note: Invincibility cheat was used.
